InstallationÂ¶

To install, download the code from github and create a build directory

git clone -b https://github.com/keweiyao/Duke-Lido.git
cd Duke-Lido
mkdir build && cd build

The requirements are : a c++11 support compiler, cmake>=3.4, c++ boost library > 1.50, gsl library, and c++ hdf5 library. The default cmake also builds with Pythia8 support, but you can turn-off Pythia8 linking and disable the dependent exectuable by,

cmake -Dpythia8=off ..

otherwise,

cmake ..
